kubejs.ponder.tag.multiblocks.descriptio: A Better Visual For Masterful Machines
kubejs.ponder.basics_casing_scene.text_1: In this multiblock, this is the edge casing:
kubejs.ponder.basics_casing_scene.text_2: You cannot replace edge casing with structural glass.
kubejs.ponder.basics_glass_scene.text_1: In this multiblock, this is the 'glass':
kubejs.ponder.basics_glass_scene.text_2: You can replace structural glass with casings or ports, as shown here.
kubejs.ponder.basics_insides_scene.text_: In this multiblock, these are the insides:
The insides vary depending on the multiblock.
Some may be necessary, some will improve performance.
kubejs.ponder.basics_overview_scene.head: Mekanaism Multiblock Basics: The parts of a multiblock
kubejs.ponder.basics_overview_scene.text: All of them have a similar structure consisting of four main parts;
And the insides (this multiblock doesn't have any).
No blocks can be used by two multiblocks at the same time.
kubejs.ponder.basics_port_scene.text_1: In this multiblock, these are the ports:
kubejs.ponder.basics_port_scene.text_3: You can have as many ports as there are 'glass' blocks.
kubejs.ponder.basics_port_scene.text_4: I don't know why you would want this many, but you can.
kubejs.ponder.basics_scale_scene.text_1: Almost all Mekanism multiblocks can be scaled up to 18x18x18.
kubejs.ponder.basics_scale_scene.text_2: The only exceptions being the Supercritical Phase Shifter and the Fusion Reactor.
kubejs.ponder.basics_scale_scene.text_3: The Thermal Evaporation Plant can only go 18 blocks tall, as it's base must be 4x4.
kubejs.ponder.basics_scale_scene.text_4: Check out the individual builds for more detail.
kubejs.ponder.cmc_scene.header: How to build the Creative Meta-Combiner
kubejs.ponder.cmc_scene.text_10: Now your Creative Meta-Combiner will work!
kubejs.ponder.cmc_scene.text_2: It converts normal items into their creative versions using Creativium.
kubejs.ponder.cmc_scene.text_3: Here's a layered guide to build it.
kubejs.ponder.cmc_scene.text_9: Don't forget to power the ME Controllers!
kubejs.ponder.condenser_scene.header: How to build the Cloud Condenser
kubejs.ponder.condenser_scene.text_2: It turns Liquid Steam into Cloud Seed.
kubejs.ponder.condenser_scene.text_3: Here's a layered guide to build it.
kubejs.ponder.dynamic_tank_scene.header: How to build the Dynamic Tank
kubejs.ponder.dynamic_tank_scene.text_2: It can store a massive amount of fluid.
kubejs.ponder.dynamic_tank_scene.text_3: Here's a layered guide to build it.
kubejs.ponder.et_scene.header: How to build the Elemental Transfigurator
kubejs.ponder.et_scene.text_2: It converts a mix of items into an elemental form, be it scientific or cosmic.
kubejs.ponder.et_scene.text_3: Here's a layered guide to build it.
kubejs.ponder.evaporation_scene.header: How to build the Thermal Evaporation Plant
kubejs.ponder.evaporation_scene.text_1: This is the Thermal Evaporation Plant.
kubejs.ponder.evaporation_scene.text_10: The controller can replace any 'glass' block.
kubejs.ponder.evaporation_scene.text_2: It turns water into brine or brine into lithium through heat.
kubejs.ponder.evaporation_scene.text_3: Here's a layered guide to build it.
kubejs.ponder.evaporation_scene.text_8: The Thermal Evaporation Plant can only go 18 blocks tall, as it's base must be 4x4.
kubejs.ponder.evaporation_scene.text_9: The solar panels at the top serve as the heating element, but any heat source will work.
kubejs.ponder.fission_reactor_scene.head: How to build the Fission Reactor
kubejs.ponder.fission_reactor_scene.text: You must Shift-Click with a Configurator to swap between these modes.
Do not let the Reactor get too hot, or it will explode!
It uses Fissile Fuel to make Steam or Superheated Sodium, but most importantly, Nuclear Waste.
Here's a layered guide to build it.
The ports of the Fission Reactor must be configured correctly.
kubejs.ponder.fusion_reactor_scene.heade: How to build the Fusion Reactor
kubejs.ponder.fusion_reactor_scene.text_: You must Shift-Click with a Configurator to swap between these modes.
1 billion FE devilered by laser is required to ignite the fusion process.
The laser must enter by the Laser focus Matrix.
A hohlraum filled with D-T Fuel is reqired to start the fusion process.
Deuterium and Tritium must continuously be supplied to the Reactor or you will have to reignite it.
With this setup, you can now ignite the Fusion Reactor!
It generates energy by fusing Deuterium and Tritium.
Here's a layered guide to build it.
The ports of the Fusion Reactor must be configured correctly.
kubejs.ponder.ias_scene.header: How to build the Industrial Alloy Smelter
kubejs.ponder.ias_scene.text_1: This is the Industrial Alloy Smelter.
kubejs.ponder.ias_scene.text_2: It combines serveral dusts into an alloy, not necessarily of metallic nature.
kubejs.ponder.ias_scene.text_3: Here's a layered guide to build it.
kubejs.ponder.induction_matrix_scene.hea: How to build the Induction Matrix
kubejs.ponder.induction_matrix_scene.tex: You must Shift-Click with a Configurator to swap between these modes.
It can store a massive amount of energy.
Here's a layered guide to build it.
The ports of the Induction Matrix must be configured correctly.
kubejs.ponder.sps_scene.header: How to build the Supercritical Phase Shifter
kubejs.ponder.sps_scene.text_1: This is the Supercritical Phase Shifter (or SPS for short).
kubejs.ponder.sps_scene.text_11: The ports of the SPS must be configured correctly.
kubejs.ponder.sps_scene.text_14: You must Shift-Click with a Configurator to swap between these modes.
kubejs.ponder.sps_scene.text_15: The coils must be powered to make the machine work.
kubejs.ponder.sps_scene.text_3: Here's a layered guide to build it.
kubejs.ponder.thermoelectric_boiler_pt5_: Adjusting the Fluid Capacities of the Thermoelectric Boiler
The Superheating Elements must be underneath the Pressure Dispersers.
The Pressure Dispersers must form a single uniform layer of the multiblock,
but the layer can be moved to change the water and steam storage amounts.
Changing the height of the Superheating Elements won't affect anything.
kubejs.ponder.thermoelectric_boiler_pt6_: Adjusting the Boiling Capacity of the Thermoelectric Boiler
Adding more Superheaters will increase boil capacity.
Note that Display Links do not work on Mekanism Multiblocks.
kubejs.ponder.thermoelectric_boiler_scen: How to build the Thermoelectric Boiler
The ports of the Thermoelectric Boiler must be configured correctly.
You must Shift-Click with a Configurator to swap between these modes.
Superheated Sodium can be inputted and turned back into normal Sodium
Here's a layered guide to build it.
kubejs.ponder.turbine_scene.text_10: The Turbine Vents can be hooked up to a pipe to recycle water.
kubejs.ponder.turbine_scene.text_11: The main way to optimise the Turbine is to add more blades.
kubejs.ponder.turbine_scene.text_12: Check the statistics panel of the Turbine to know wat to optimise.
kubejs.ponder.turbine_scene.text_3: Here's a layered guide to build it.
